name: Space Maze 2
description:
Space Maze 2 is my entry for #GBJAM8. I had quite a few ideas but ended up taking a simpler one and simply doing a follow up to my earlier Space Maze game. Space Maze 2 is a simple platformer with only one level and a few items. There is no background music or sound effects partially due to me working solo and assets having to be created during the jam period. I did have a quick crack at sfx though didn't produce anything that made it into the game.

Search for the four batteries to restore power to the elevator while collecting the terrariums for oxygen.

CONTROLS:
Movement - Arrow keys
Interact - C
Jump - X

Walk/Run select - Shift

View scale - Enter + Up arrow
Random pallete - Enter + Right arrow
Disable pallete shader - Enter + Left arrow

Close game - Esc

CREDITS:
Engine: GameMaker: Studio 1.4
Font: Pixeltype by TheJman0205
Palette Shader: E Breakey
Palettes: lospec.com
